title: Layout characters wider than one cell correctly under non-DBCS codepages, like 65001.
body: Currently character wider (visually) than one cell (or i mean, a space character's width) can be correctly layouted only in DBCS codepages (that is, 932, 950, 949 and 936). In other codepages like 65001, all wider characters are fit in one cell, and cannot be shown correctly.
